message_id.description: Unique message identifier within the chat

date.description: Unix timestamp when the message was sent

chat_type.description: Type of chat: private, group, supergroup, channel

is_forum.description: Whether the chat is a forum (has topics)

from_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who sent the message

from_is_bot.description: Whether the sender is a bot

is_topic_message.description: Whether the message is part of a forum topic

forward_from_chat_id.description: Chat ID of the original message if forwarded

forward_date.description: Unix timestamp of the original message if forwarded

has_photo.description: Whether the message contains a photo

has_video.description: Whether the message contains a video

has_document.description: Whether the message contains a document

has_voice.description: Whether the message contains a voice message

has_sticker.description: Whether the message contains a sticker

has_poll.description: Whether the message contains a poll

has_location.description: Whether the message contains a location

raw_update.description: Full raw update object from Telegram API
